column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Been here twice and have always had a great experience- service is friendly
column2: not fast (but at tapas bar speed)
column4: and the sangria is excellent. We had the omeletta (very good)
column8: meatballs (very good) and the stuffed mushrooms (OK). Also had the butterscotch dessert
column9: which was small but excellent. Overall
